attributes.action: Designate Ekaterina Zigunova and Her Followers as Terrorists
attributes.additional_details: Ekaterina Zigunova and her followers use violence and intimidation to force homosexuals out of Russia. According the unofficial definition of the word "terrorism" given by MI5 (https://www.mi5.gov.uk/home/the-threats/terrorism.html) this would qualify them as terrorists. This would provide a means for the UK government take an effective stand against the rampant homophobia that exists in the Russian Federation.

rejection.details: Currently this e-petition is not suitable for publication as it refers to a specific individual who is not a public figure.  You may wish to resubmit referring instead to the organisation she is part of.
